How to install inxi:
```shell script
sudo apt install inxi       # [On Debian/Ubuntu/Linux Mint]
sudo yum install inxi       # [On CentOs/RHEL/Fedora]
sudo dnf install inxi       # [On Fedora 22+]
sudo pacman -S inxi         # [On Arch]
```
